entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 3:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: WSW 57 km/h gust 75 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
